solution_line_template: Bella is {bella_anne_multiplier} times as tall as Anne hence Bella's height is {bella_anne_multiplier}*{Anne_height} cm = <<{bella_anne_multiplier}*{Anne_height}={bella_height}>>{bella_height} cm
The height difference between Bella and Anne's sister = {bella_height}-{sister_height} = <<{bella_height}-{sister_height}={height_difference}>>{height_difference}cm
